name: Bodega Cats & Cheese
description:
Embark on an urban adventure as Nacho “Cheddar” Cheese, New York City’s favourite bodega cat. 

Traverse Little Cat Deli, jump across high shelves and platforms, and grab ingredients for the upcoming order. 

Once all the ingredients are secured, prepare to receive a treat and enjoy a short break of basking in the sun. 

Developed as part of the Indie Game Academy Level 3 Cohort 5 Game Jam. 

Credits: 
Nicole Martinez - Lead Artist and Animator

Lumi  - Lead Level Designer

Tyra McNeil - Lead Writer and UX Designer

Julie Pyle - Head of Business and Marketing

Valencia Coleman - Lead Programmer
